title: Zucchini Carpaccio
source: The Food of Sicily - Fabrizia Lanza
categories: The Food of Sicily - Fabrizia Lanza
ingredients: - ¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
directions: 1. Using a mandoline or a very sharp knife, slice the zucchini lengthwise as thinly as possible. Arrange the zucchini slices on a serving platter.2. Use a vegetable peeler to shave the Parmigiano cheese into thin slivers and scatter over the zucchini. Sprinkle the oregano, salt, and pepper over the salad.3. Just before serving, drizzle with the olive oil and add lemon juice to taste. Toss gently to combine and serve at once.
